topic.title: Storage Spaces Direct
topic.shortdesc: Here's a list of what's new in Storage Spaces Direct. For details, see What's new in Storage Spaces Direct../storage/whats-new-in-storage.md#storage-spaces-direct. Also see Azure Stack HCI/azure-stack/operator/azure-stack-hci-overview for info on acquiring validated Storage Spaces Direct systems.

li.p: Deduplication and compression for ReFS volumes
Nested resiliency for two-node hyper-converged infrastructure at the edge
Two-server clusters using a USB flash drive as a witness
Scale up to 4 PB per cluster
Manually delimit the allocation of volumes to increase fault tolerance
